summary: Most diffs focus on theme polish (new global tokens, typography, shared utilities, and consistent component styling across sections). However, the diff also includes multiple non-theme/content/feature changes that were not requested (notably siteContent copy edits, SEO/meta updates, deployment docs, and functional additions like a React Query mutation hook and UTM logic).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated site content/copy (contact email, contact form messaging, and leadership members/titles) beyond minor typographic presentation.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is theme-only and lists changing company copy/content strategy as a non-goal; content structure should remain intact.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed contact form submission behavior via a React Query mutation hook for submitting messages.
hallucinated_features.reason: Theme-only request; adding/altering submission logic is a functional change not requested and may affect backend interactions.

hallucinated_features.description: SEO/meta tag overhaul in the HTML entry point.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3 (theme-only); constitutes a new scope area (SEO).
Not part of the requested theme upgrade; unrelated documentation addition.

hallucinated_features.description: UTM tracking/app identifier logic in footer links.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; introduces tracking-related behavior beyond visual/theme changes.
